"Numbers, they're coming your way!": "I have to deal with this mess right when I get back from America. I'm working 200% hard here!"
"Phul and Aratron have cleaned up on their end... Shouldn't you head to the school?"

"It'll be fine. <%me> is taking care of it.
I wouldn't make it in time anyway."
"Besides... The enemy still hasn't given up yet."
"Ahhh, come on already! We're 100% too popular!"
"Don't mention it. But we can't relax just yet."

"We'll stop them no matter what.
If we don't, they'll never forgive us."
"Hitsugi, Kohri. I know it's been a while, but we'll have to catch up some other time!"
"I'm reading enemies right above you! There's a lot of them!"
